Class 6

Sep 24, 2017 - Sun

View On Github

Home work

read css text to css counters from w3schools. Just read for one time.

all css selector

tag selector

html:
<li><a href="http://google.com">google</a></li>

css:
li {
}
li a {
}

class selector

html:
<li><a class="yahoo" href="http://yahoo.com">yahoo</a></li>

css:
.yahoo {
  color: teal;
}

id selector

html:
<li><a id="mic" href="http://mic.com">microsoft</a></li>

css:
a#mic {
  color: tomato;
}

attribute selector

html:
<li><a href="http://google.com">google</a></li>

a[href="http://google.com"] {
  color: salmon;
}

pseudo selector

html:
<li><a href="http://google.com">google</a></li>

css:
a:hover {

}

all terminal command

  • ls
  • touch
  • mkdir
  • cd
  • cp
  • cp -r //incase of folder
  • rm
  • rm -r -f
  • rm -rf
  • mv
  • cat // to read file

selection

  • parent directory ..
  • own directory .
  • all *

flag (always start with - )

  • r - recursive
  • f - force
  • a - all
